# Animations


## some animations names

Protestor
running:
duck:
deke:
stumble:
stumblebig:
clothesline:
captured:

Cop:
1 running
2 duck
3 deke
4 clothesline
5 falling
6 reaching
7 reaching2
8 capturing
9 capturing2

## Protestor frame notes

totalframes for animation (example: 40) 30x30 pixels

40 player run
10 player duck
10 player hop

25 player stumble light/dog
20 player stumble heavy

15 player fall clothesline
20 player fail trip
